com.threatmetrix.TrustDefender

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threatmetrix.TrustDefender.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    Config class contains all possible options which can be sent to the TrustDefender.init(Config) method. There are 2 compulsory options
    • setOrgId(String)
    • setContext(Context)

    Please note that since the TrustDefender.init(Config) is effective only the first time it's called during the lifecycle of the application, changing the values of these options or passing a new Config instance to the init() method does NOT have any effect. Each setter returns 'this', to allow easy chaining of multiple setter calls, for example 

     Config config = new Config().setTimeout(10).setContext(context);

    • Field Detail

      • THM_OPTION_ALL

        public static final long THM_OPTION_ALL
        Default option bitmask. Includes all profiling options, typically individual options are removed in the style of THM_OPTION_ALL & (~bitmask to exclude).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Allows control over package scan during the init call.

      • setDisableAppHashing

        public Config setDisableAppHashing(boolean disableAppScan)
        Disable app hashing, which can potentially be slow. This affects both TrustDefender.init(Config) and subsequent profile requests.
        Parameters:
        disableAppScan - set to true to disable app hashing
        Returns:
        this

      • setTimeout

        public Config setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the timeout for individual network requests. Default is 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        timeout - in seconds

      • setApiKey

        public Config setApiKey(String apiKey)
        Set an API key for the profiling request. Only do this if the account configuration requires it, as an incorrectly configured API key will result in blocked profiling requests
        Parameters:
        apiKey - to use in profiling requests

      • setRegisterForLocationServices

        public Config setRegisterForLocationServices(boolean registerForLocationServices)
        Register for location services. By passing true to this method the SDK will register for location services. Default is disabled.
        Parameters:
        registerForLocationServices - If true the SDK registers for location services
        Returns:
        true on success

      • setLowPowerUpdateTime

        public Config setLowPowerUpdateTime(long lowPowerUpdateTime)
        Sets the time, in seconds, between the low power location updates. Default is 15 minutes.
        Parameters:
        lowPowerUpdateTime - time in seconds
        Returns:
        this

      • setHighPowerUpdateTime

        public Config setHighPowerUpdateTime(long highPowerUpdateTime)
        Sets the time, in seconds, between the high power location updates. Default is 60 minutes.
        Parameters:
        highPowerUpdateTime - time in seconds
        Returns:
        this

      • setLocationAccuracy

        public Config setLocationAccuracy(int accuracy)
        Set the configured accuracy to be requested from location services. Higher accuracy can drain the battery more. Default is Criteria.ACCURACY_LOW. Criteria.ACCURACY_LOW
        Parameters:
        accuracy - Criteria
        Returns:
        this

        Parameters:

      • setContext

        public Config setContext(Context context)
        This is mandatory. An application context is required.
        Parameters:
        context - Application Context
        Returns:
        this

      • setPackageScanTimeLimit

        public Config setPackageScanTimeLimit(int packageScanTimeLimit)
        Sets the maximum time to spend to process packages during init(). 0 disables the limit NOTE: that the limit isn't precise, the logic is simply: if(timeSpent < packageScanTimeLimit) processNextPackage(); So the time taken can be in the region of timeLimit + time take to process last package
        Parameters:
        packageScanTimeLimit - in millisecond
        Returns:
        this

      • setInitPackageScanTimeLimit

        public Config setInitPackageScanTimeLimit(int initPackageScanTimeLimit)
        During init() a package scan will occur, the init package scan limit (and the init package scan time limit) controls the behaviour of this scan. setPackageScanTimeLimit(int)
        Parameters:
        initPackageScanTimeLimit - - maximum time in milliseconds spent in scan during init()
        Returns:
        this

      • setFPServer

        public Config setFPServer(String fp_server)
        Set the fingerprint server to use. Note this is a domain and not a URL. Default is h-sdk.online-metrix.net
        Parameters:
        fp_server - domain to connect to during profiling
        Returns:
        this

      • setDisableLocSerOnBatteryLow

        public Config setDisableLocSerOnBatteryLow(boolean m_disableLocSerOnBatteryLow)
        By setting this flag to true, the location services will be paused when the battery is low and will be resumed when the device is charging or the battery level is OK.
        Parameters:
        m_disableLocSerOnBatteryLow - The default value is false

      • setScreenOffTimeout

        public Config setScreenOffTimeout(int screenOffTimeout)
        Sets the screen off timeout (in seconds). By setting this argument when the screen is off future profiling will be blocked after screenOffTimeout seconds. Any profiling done after that will return instantly with the result of THMStatusCode.THM_Blocked. Profiling will be enabled when the screen turns back on
        Parameters:
        screenOffTimeout - Number of the seconds before disabling profiling after screen goes off. The Default value is 180 seconds (3 minutes)

      • setOrgId

        public Config setOrgId(String m_orgId)
        This is mandatory. Sets the orgId (which is assigned to your organisation by ThreadMetrix)
